name: Idle Plant Game
description:
Idle Plant Game

Immerse yourself in the serene world of "Idle Plant Game," where you don't just grow plants — you are the plant.

  • Succulent
  • Fern
  • Moss
  • Berry Bush
  • Colony of Grass
  • The Time Vine

Each with their own unique path to photosynthetic mastery.

This is an idle game, with the right strategy.

It is also a very active clicker if you want faster progression.

It is also a labor of love that is offered free for the world.
